column6: p.r.; Computer simulation based on p.b.k. at 390 (as well as abs. at 310, 470 and 595) nm in air-free soln. contg. $2 \times 10^{-2}$ mol L$^{-1}$ MV$^{2+}$ and $5 \times 10^{-3}$ mol L$^{-1}$ Cl$^-$; corr. for Cl$_2^-$ and ClOH$^-$ formn. and decay; addn. to N (protonated methyl viologen radical cation) formn. and to C (H adduct) occurred in approx. equal amounts [84A322].
